map.string: Show visual param hints in appearance editors.
Disable automatic sit upon click for sit click action targets
Disables the minimum zoom distance, allowing more camera freedom
Command to set clear nearby chat history for this session.
Command to teleport to specified height
Command to hover your height or something
Command to teleport to another region
Command to set nearby chat channel
Command to send a region message
Command to stop/start in order to resync animations
Default size of platform to rez
Command to set the avatar home
Marks unnamed objects in chat and IMs.
Hide Hover Text in cinematic mode.
Disable collision of camera with objects and ground plane
Disable mouse steering. Doing so will stop your camera from resetting, and your avatar from rotating when you click yourself (escape key-like behaviour).
Always use root object as edit pivot point
Enables GameMode (Linux Only) for better performance.
Distance at which hover text starts fading.
Distance over which hover text will fade out.
Ignore simulator collision plane for camera constraints
Amount of threads to use for image decoding. 0 = autodetect, 1 = 0ff, >1 number of threads. Needs restart
Control whether new scripts in inventory are mono(true) or lsl(false)
Keep graphical preferences when GPU changes
Last active tab in directory floater
If true, own look at distance will be clamped to a determined distance
Distance at which to clamp own avatar look at
Disable broadcast of own look at to other users.
Show count of users in region on world map
Draw rings to denote chat range
Render a red line in the center of the camera view frustrum
Render a red line in the center of the camera view frustrum
Use the world map tile as the minimap background
Allow camera to reset when moving.
Display user that is currently focused upon by crosshair in mouselook
Display target markers for offscreen avatars in mouselook
Scalar for smooth mouselook zoom time
Cuttoff to force zoom to target fov
Chat channel used for sending nearby chat from the viewer
Sync nearby list name colors to minimap
0 - IM, 1 - Profile, 2 - Zoom In, 3 - Teleport To
Show nearby chat typing indicator in nametags
If true, disables prejump animation flags
Notify of incoming messages by looking for typing indicator
Log online and offline notifications to local chat
Disable setting current point at target
Display notification upon avatar entry or departure of current region
Log radar alerts to local chat
Make the camera follow avatar body movements and animations while in mouselook
Maximum age to keep recent people around
Use Enhanced Subpixel Morphological Antialiasing in Deferred
Revoke permissions on object on sit(1), stand(2) or both(3)
Allows the agent to rez objects under the target locations land group. Must be a member of the land group.
Enable chat keyword alerts for nearby chat and instant messages
Display seconds in chat log timestamp
Double-clicking an attachment in inventory will add wear it rather than replace wear it
Double-clicking a clothing wearable in inventory will add wear it rather than replace wear it
Amount of time (in seconds) group chat will be snoozed for
The last selected grass option from the build tools
The last selected tree option from the build tools
This enables the local inventory system. (Requires restart.)
Use alternative method of detecing suitable textures for alphamasking. Less prone to excluding textures than standard method.
Sets the maximum random mean square error cutoff used when detecting suitable textures for alphamasking. (RenderAutoMaskAlphaUseRMSE must be TRUE for this to have any effect)
Sets the maximum percent of mid-range alpha pixels textures for alphamasking. (RenderAutoMaskAlphaUseRMSE must be TRUE for this to have any effect)
Name of image file for color grading LUT(TGA, PNG, or WebP)
Whether the focus point used for DoF is currently Locked in place
Allows the Depth of Field focus to actively follow the mouse point
Sharpening level for CAS 0 to 1 range.
Sharpening level for DLS 0 to 1 range.
Denoise level for DLS 0 to 1 range.
Tonemapping type 0 - HDR Debug, 1 - ACES, 2 - Uchimura, 3 - AMD, 4 - Uncharted
Always soften shadows when shadows are enabled
Number of stops between 'hdrMax' and 18% mid-level on input.
Input range 0.0 (no extra contrast) to 1.0 (maximum contrast)
One channel must be 1.0, the rest can be greater than or equal to 1.0 but not zero.
One channel must be 1.0, the rest can be greater than or equal to 1.0 but not zero.
One channel must be 1.0, the rest can be greater than or equal to 1.0 but not zero.
A per channel adjustment, use less than 0 decrease, 0=no change, greater 0 increase.
A per channel adjustment, use less than 0 decrease, 0=no change, greater 0 increase.
A per channel adjustment, use less than 0 decrease, 0=no change, greater 0 increase.
Use optional extra shoulderContrast tuning (set to false if shoulderContrast is 1.0).
Length of linear section in tonemapping curve
Saves an empty color file on login to start fresh on next launch
Show group profiles in floaters rather than the sidebar
Show L$ Balance in Status Bar
Show seconds in the statusbar Time
Show audio stream info in toasts
Show audio stream info in nearby chat
Saved list of parcel audio streams
Stores the column visibility of the inspect window
This option allows you to orbit your camera without your avatar rotating when clicking on it or your nametag.
Whether to blur near camera in depth of field
Draw instructional overlay for mouselook - Press esc to leave
Draw position and health in mouselook
Allow Restore to World of no-copy items
Width of name field in fancy chat
If true, names will be bold in plain text chat
Name of font for Chat Editors and Messages
Name of font for Notecard Editors
Size of font for Notecard Editors
Name of font for Script Editors
Size of font for Script Editors
Global override xml for main font
Global override xml for monospace font
Show reflection probes in the transparency debug view
Show the distance of other residents from yourself in the name tags
Change the color of the name tag based on the distance of other avatars
Show non-default settings only in Color Settings list
Invert pitch axis in all joystick modes.
Last selected tab in search window
Controls what action Legacy Search should take when teleporting: 0 = No effect, 1 = Close floater, 2 Minimise floater
Display results of find groups that are flagged as general
Display results of find groups that are flagged as moderate
Display results of find groups that are flagged as adult
Display results of find classifieds that are flagged as general
Display results of find classifieds that are flagged as moderate
Display results of find classifieds that are flagged as adult

Display results of find events that are flagged as moderate
Display results of find events that are flagged as adult

Display results of find land sales that are flagged as moderate
Display results of find land sales that are flagged as adult

Display results of find places or find popular that are in moderate sims
Display results of find places or find popular that are in adult sims
Enables filtering of land search results by area
Enables filtering of land search results by price
Controls which type of land you are searching for in Find Land interface ("All", "Auction", "For Sale")
